text: Otoba acuminata is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae found in Costa Rica, Ecuador, and Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss.Mitré, M. 1998. Otoba acuminata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. ==References== Category:Myristicaceae Category:Flora of Costa Rica Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Flora of Panama Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
